news.text: I supported the Demo of “BeCasso: Artistic Image Processing and Editing on Mobile Devices” at the SIGGRAPH Asia 2016 Symposium on Mobile Graphics and Interactive Applications. The demo received a Best Demo Award.
I fly to Buenos Aires to present our architectural styles for Android app product lines at the MOBILESoft, co-located with the International Conference on Software Engineering.
We published our Pencil Hatching app for Android.
